messages.content: look at words/Andy Clark's extended mind.md and make the frontmatter work for this open file so that it works on my astro site

thinkingBlock.thinking:
The user wants me to look at the file "words/Andy Clark's extended mind.md" and make the frontmatter work for the open file "words/tweets.md" so that it works on their astro site.

First, I need to read both files to understand what's in them and what frontmatter is needed.

Let me start by reading the Andy Clark's extended mind file to see what frontmatter it has, then read the tweets.md file to see what needs to be adjusted.

messages.content: I'll help you set up the frontmatter for your tweets.md file to work with your Astro site. Let me first examine both files to understand the structure.

messages.content:
I've updated the frontmatter for your tweets.md file to match the Astro site structure used in your Andy Clark's extended mind.md file. The frontmatter now includes:

- `title`: Tweets
- `description`: Collection of interesting tweets and social media insights  
- `pubDate`: 2025-11-17 (today's date)
- `category`: words
- `pageType`: social

This should make it work properly with your Astro site's content collection system.
